thread.title: Light L16: The power of 16 cameras packed in one tiny device
thread.title_full: Light L16: The power of 16 cameras packed in one tiny device

author: Deccan
title: Light L16: The power of 16 cameras packed in one tiny device
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 08, 2015, 15.32 pm Light L16 Camera Light is a company of technologists aiming at making high-quality photography more accessible than ever before. Treading down the same path, Light has announced its latest Light L16 camera.
Using a new approach to folded optic design, the Light L16 Camera packs DSLR quality into a slim camera body.
With 16 individual cameras, ten of them firing simultaneously, the L16 captures the detail of shots at multiple fixed focal lengths. The images are later computationally fused to create a high quality image with up to 52MP resolution.
